summary: Project to deploy an update that includes a department dropdown and adds a student results lookup via hallticket number/roll number input.

existing_features.title: Add a Hallticket No / Roll No lookup section in the Dashboard view that lets the user enter a hallticket/roll number and view that studentâ€™s results from the currently loaded Excel dataset.
Ensure the student result lookup respects the currently selected Department filter context by default, and clearly indicates when no match is found under the current department selection.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Roll No / Hallticket No input section to fetch and display a student's results by entering the hallticket number.

projectName: Add Hallticket/Roll Number lookup to show an individual student's results
